thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Number of crypto hedge funds doubles in 4 months- Autonomous NEXT data

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Number of crypto hedge funds doubles in 4 months- Autonomous NEXT data
text:
LONDON, Feb 15 (Reuters) - Hedge funds focused on trading cryptocurrencies more than doubled in the four months to Feb. 15, hitting a record high of 226, showed new data from fintech research house Autonomous NEXT on Thursday.
The firm had recorded just 110 global hedge funds with a similar strategy as of Oct. 18, up from 55 funds at Aug. 29 and just 37 at the start of 2017.
Assets under management hit between $3.5 and $5 billion, according to the firm. (Reporting by Maiya Keidan and Jemima Kelly)
